name: imageFlip
description: Flips an image across an axis.

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.description: This example shows how to rotate an image by 270 degrees.
examples.code:
<!--- Create a ColdFusion image from an existing JPEG file. ---> 
 <cfimage source="../cfdocs/images/artgallery/paul03.jpg" name="myImage"> 
 <!--- Turn on antialiasing to improve image quality. ---> 
 <cfset ImageSetAntialiasing(myImage,"on")> 
 <!--- Rotate the image by 270 degrees. ---> 
 <cfset ImageFlip(myImage,"270")> 
 <!--- Display the modified image in a browser. ---> 
 <cfimage source="#myImage#" action="writeToBrowser">
